projects.title: L1 Rocketry Certification
projects.description: Design and construction of a Level 1 certification rocket capable of meeting the basic requirements in order to earn L1 certification.

events.title: Guest Speaker: NASA Engineer
events.description: A talk about propulsion systems and internship opportunities.

events.title: Drone Racing Workshop
events.description: Hands-on practice with FPV drone piloting.

pillars.title: Avionics
pillars.description: Development of custom flight computers, telemetry systems, and autonomous control logic for UAVs.

pillars.title: Aerodynamics
pillars.description: Utilizing CFD analysis and wind tunnel testing to optimize airframe efficiency and stability.

pillars.title: Crew Training
pillars.description: Mentorship programs pairing senior engineers with new members to teach CAD, soldering, and piloting.

siteContent.homeHeroSubtitle: Los Altos High School Aviation Club. Designing drones, rockets, and the next generation of aerospace engineers.
siteContent.missionStatement: Bridging the gap between theoretical physics and real-world aerospace engineering through hands-on fabrication and flight testing.
siteContent.contactSubtitle: We are looking for students passionate about engineering, design, and flight. No prior experience is requiredâ€”just curiosity.

name: LAHS Aviation Club
description: Official website for the Los Altos High School Aviation Club, featuring a digital Project Archive, project blueprints, and flight schedules.
